short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of making decisions? Do you find yourself constantly flipping a coin or asking others for their opinions? Look no…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of making decisions? Do you find yourself constantly flipping a coin or asking others for their opinions? Look no further than our new Chrome extension! Every time you open a new tab, you’ll be greeted with a random “yes” or “no” to help guide your decision-making process. No more second-guessing or indecisiveness - let our extension make the tough choices for you.

Our extension is perfect for those who struggle with decision-making or simply want to add a bit of fun and spontaneity to their daily routine. Whether you’re deciding what to eat for lunch, which outfit to wear, or whether to go out or stay in, our extension has got you covered. With its simple and user-friendly interface, you’ll be able to quickly and easily get the answers you need.

But that’s not all - our extension also features customizable settings to tailor the experience to your needs. Want more control over the randomness? You can adjust the probability of getting a “yes” or “no” to suit your preferences. Want to add a personal touch? You can even upload your own custom images to display alongside the “yes” or “no” responses.

Our extension is also lightweight and won’t slow down your browsing experience. It’s been optimized for speed and performance, so you can enjoy quick and seamless decision-making without any lag or interruptions. Plus, it’s completely free to use - no hidden fees or subscriptions required.

In summary, our Chrome extension is the ultimate tool for anyone looking to simplify their decision-making process and add a bit of fun and excitement to their daily routine. With its easy-to-use interface, customizable settings, and lightning-fast performance, it’s the perfect addition to any Chrome user’s arsenal.
